title: नहीं, पीएम नरेंद्र मोदी ने रैली में अपशब्द नहीं कहे
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: What kind of language is this Mr. PM? Does it beholds the Prime Minister of the country to use profanity and that too publicly? Shocking beyond belief !! Have some respect for the chair, if nothing else. 😡 pic.twitter.com/tVrHVbSlek
